item.title: Learning Notes about Image in Frontend
item.description: These days when I handle the image in the frontend, there are some concepts make me confusing. How can we handle the image when saving, uploading and transfering the files? So I want to write some notes about the learning processing here. What is Blob, Buffer, ArrayBuffer and Base64 format? How to convert them among one another? How can they be used with Image? Concept ArrayBuffer ArrayBuffer is an build-in object in Javascript that represents a generic, fixed-length binary data buffer.
